listitem.name: PitchBlack Recovery is a fork of TWRP
with many improvements to make your
experience better. It's more flexible & easy
with the movement to enhance TWRP
with better customizatons, themes and features.
interface that allows users to install
the current system which are functions
often unsupported by stock recovery images.
It is, therefore, often installed when flashing,
although it isn't dependent on a device
-Tools in PitchBlack Recovery is a feature,
user can used this feature for root or other
-Themes in PitchBlack Recovery is a custom
image, your can select themes by your like
-Fonts in PitchBlack Recovery is a custom
fonts your can select fonts for custom text
-AB Devices is a feature for device AB partition,
AB Devices this feature not worked for A only
-Codename changer this a feature for change
product device in recovery, you can change if need
dont change codename if not have issue installation
example raphael and raphaelin device same
-For miui user if need procedure OTA, you
can open Setting OTA and click icon i
this for information step by step OTA MIUI

actions.action: tw_text4={@pb_dev_reboot=A Reboot is mandatory After switching Codenames}

listitem.name: ? Install Recovery Ramdisk - This can be used on a A/B
device to Install Recovery Ramdisk on Boot Partition
? Install Kernel - This can be used on a A/B
device to flash custom kernel on Boot Partition
and this kernel will used both by Recovery and Rom
? Fix Recovery Bootloop - This can be used on a A/B
device to fix a recovery bootloop if the kernel has been
patched to always boot the ramdisk for root
Q: Why im not found menu in here with
A ONLY devices, this a bug?
A: Not, Because this feature for AB devices,
if your AB devices this feature will show
Q: Why hidden this feature for A ONLY
A: Because for minimalize problem with A ONLY devices,

or created icon pack by your self
3. Choose icon pack your created or download
3. Swipe if need apply the icon
Good luck your icon will update
1. Download fonts from google or other with format ttf
2. Select fonts your will apply in storage
3. Swipe after your select fonts, then
4. Reboot recovery after theme apply in progress,
Good luck your fonts will update
Not all fonts support for recovery,
if your facing issue after change font

listitem.name: TeamWin for source code of TWRP
- Reboot to PBRP then Checklist incremental
OTA signature verification, include system in OTA
- Install full rom MIUI, it will automatic backup
boot and system for the OTA survival.
- Check OTA survival in folder PB internal storage
you can found boot and system
- Open updater app and when update releases,
download it and press update. example miui
reboot to PBRP then OTA flashing will start,
this time the backed up boot and system
will be flashed and thus patching
will happen and your device will be updated
? Note: for those who do not use OTA,
thus preventing recovery returning to stock.
Theme full black with white & blue accent
Added built in themes (Neon R/G/B & Just Black for now!)
Added feature to not remove PB tools while wiping internal
(Read the OTA Section in About Menu of Recovery)
Moved all themes to Internal Storage

text.text: with your new selected background color.
Add your favorite Fonts to the theme.
Download it selected from here and change it.

Download it selected from here and change it.
